instructions: In a bowl, combine the nuts and maple syrup; mix well. Sprinkle with brown sugar and salad dressing mix; stir gently to coat. Spread in a greased 15-in. x 10-in. x 1-in. baking pan. Bake at 300 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package ranch salad dressing mix
title: Roasted Mixed Nuts
